section.heading: Exemptions—Sales by persons taxable under chapter 82.16 RCW

content.p: Print RCWs > Title 82 > Chapter 82.08 > Section 82.08.0252 82.08.0251 << 82.08.0252 >> 82.08.02525 PDF RCW 82.08.0252 Exemptions — Sales by persons taxable under chapter 82.16 RCW. The tax levied by RCW 82.08.020 shall not apply to sales made by persons in the course of business activities with respect to which tax liability is specifically imposed under chapter 82.16 RCW, when the gross proceeds from such sales must be included in the measure of the tax imposed under said chapter. [ 1980 c 37 s 20 . Formerly RCW 82.08.030 (2).] NOTES: Intent — 1980 c 37: See note following RCW 82.04.4281 .
